title: Major service disruption due to rail defect on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #OutramPark towards #Kallang are now operating normally.
[EWL] UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travel time from OutramPark towards Kallang due to rail defect. We are working to recover service.
[EWL]: UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #OutramPark to #Kallang towards PasirRis due to rail defect.
[EWL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #OutramPark to #Lavender towards PasirRis due to rail defect.
